channel.title: Need help adding skillcapes when you level
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape,I need to figure out:
[ul][li]When people are training,and they level up to 99-It adds that skillhood & cape into their inventory[/li][/ul]
-All help appreciated ~Thanks, Rs w00dcut.
